com.pvptowerdefense.server.socket.handlers

Class SocketHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pvptowerdefense.server.socket.handlers.SocketHandler

  • @Component
public class SocketHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Handler for socket connections. The request has to be sent to the domain url/socket/{id} where id is the phone id.

      • onMessage

        public void onMessage(javax.websocket.Session session,
                      java.lang.String message)
        Calls the match up send message method if the user is in a match up.
        Parameters:

        message - The message as a byte[]. *NOTE This might change types.

      • onClose

        Parameters:

        id - The id of the user as a String.
